title: This Changed Earth (plus trailer and Devil's Wax ebook)
description:
Description
THIS CHANGED EARTH
2011 (c) devil's wax productions

directed by Ross Bradley & David Hinds


PAL 1.85:1 / 4:3
Color/ Stereo
102 min
rated 18 (uncut version)
english / UK
AVI

 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3106198/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3106198/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1</a>


"The earth has changed, but not for those upon it. A masked figure stalks a graveyard searching for
remnants. Moths and butterflies trapped in the light. A lizard nailed to a tree. A man imprisoned by
his own vices. A rabbit in a pantry. The search for a legendary lost movie. Hallucinogenic seeds in a
small wooden box. All these things will collide, fuse and split...and all will be born again, upon this
changed earth. Blending genres and employing a unique structure This Changed Earth comprises several
interlinked stories themed with obsession. Queen of Hearts: An obsessed and disturbed young man stalks
a beautiful woman with tragic and shocking results. He has been watching her for a long time. And
sometimes when he sees her smile he thinks that perhaps he doesn't need the pills anymore. He follows
her sometimes, and keeps a secret book, for his eyes only. His eyes devour it on a daily basis, in a
lonely room. He knows where she works, what she does for fun...where she lives. He ..."


"Blending genres and employing a unique anthology structure This Changed Earth comprises several stories
themed with obsession & transgression. A man imprisoned by his own vices. The search for a cursed movie.
Drug induced hallucinations..."


*****PLUS short story collection from 'Devil Wax's' flagship author Victor Malone*****
